text:
@Jacob_Rees_Mogg If it wasn't for the incompetency of the government you could've kept your colleagues safer for longer.
Be in no doubt - your party has been a lethal shambles in regard to covid-19 and has no plausible excuses left to offer up for its disgraceful behaviour.
